actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to extend the supplemental benefits provision for one year.
short_title: Unemployed Railroad Workers Supplemental Benefits Extension Act of 1983

summary.text: Unemployed Railroad Workers Supplemental Benefits Extension Act of 1983 - Amends the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to extend the supplemental benefits provision for certain employees with less than ten years of service from June 30, 1983, until June 30, 1984.

titles.title: Unemployed Railroad Workers Supplemental Benefits Extension Act of 1983
A bill to amend the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act to extend the supplemental benefits provision for one year.
